oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Captain Theodrick (Tod) Carter
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copy photograph of Captain Theodrick (Tod) Carter of the 20th Tennessee Volunteer Infantry from the book, Homespun Tales: The Battle of Franklin, published 1999.
Captain Theodrick (Tod) Carter (1840-1864) was wounded at the Battle of Franklin. He was found on the battlefield and taken to his home where he died.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Franklin, Battle of, Franklin, Tenn., 1864; Confederate States of America. Army--Appointments and retirements; Confederate States of America--History; United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865
Photographs
